titles.title: Health Payor Forms Simplification Act of 1993
To provide for the simplification of health payor forms.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E52)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Health Payor Forms Simplification Act of 1993 - Mandates development of simple and uniform model forms for consumers and health care providers.
